name: Relativity (itch) (Simpletoon123)
description:
After waking up with no memories, you are forced to use time travel to solve puzzles, in the name of science.

For fans of the 'Portal' series and other puzzle games.

Pre-made assets (not made by me):

"Waiting Room Chairs" (https://skfb.ly/VX99) by Connor Wassall is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).

"Start Button V01" (https://skfb.ly/6RR9n) by Frederic Wendt is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).

Modular Sci Fi Starter Bundle from the Unreal Engine Marketplace, created by Jonathon Frederick

Advanced Cel Shader Lite from the Unreal Engine Marketplace, created by Skull

200+ Grunge Decals from the Unreal Engine Marketplace, created by TextureMax

Some textures from Google images and Craiyon AI

Music by SoundGalleryByDmitryTaras from Pixabay

Special thanks to 15.ai for the text to speech. The preset I used was Ms. Pauling. Here is the link: https://15.ai
